    PowerSchool SIS

    Comprehensive Student Information System for securely managing student data, attendance, and grades across K-12 schools.

    Enrollment

    A solution simplifying student enrollment and registration processes for schools and districts.

    Enrollment Express

    Streamline digital forms and workflows to make enrollment processes faster and easier.

    Ecollect Forms

    Customizable forms for gathering data from students, parents, and staff.

    Special Programs

    A tool for managing IEPs, 504 plans, and other specialized student programs with compliance tracking.

    Predictive Enrollment Analytics

    Enrollment forecasting to assist in resource planning.

    Lesson planning, learning management, and assessmentLearn More >

    A leading Learning Management System (LMS) supporting curriculum delivery and collaboration between teachers, students, and parents.

    A leading assessment platform to deliver and grade assessments and analyze student performance and growth.

    Build, manage, and analyze standards-aligned curriculum maps and lesson plans.

    ContentNav

    Manage, organize, and access a complete library of high-quality, district-approved content tagged to standards and common metadata.

    Tools to monitor and improve student attendance and reduce chronic absenteeism.

    Resource Planning

    Budgeting, payroll, and resource management for district operationsLearn More >

    Allovue Allocate

    K-12 budgeting software that streamlines funding plans, tracks spending, and optimizes resources.

    Allovue Manage

    K-12 financial workflows to simplify spending management for school leaders, enabling real-time tracking and adjustments.

    Allovue Budget Suite

    Comprehensive K-12 budgeting tools to allocate, manage, and track school and district funds effectively.

    Atrieve

    A workforce management solution for payroll, HR, and operations.

    BusinessPlus

    A financial management platform for school districts.

    eFinancePlus

    Tools for managing school district finances and payroll efficiently.

    Analytics, data visualization, and embedded toolsLearn More >

    Student Analytics

    Analytics tools for a complete picture of your schools, classrooms, and students.

    Risk Analysis

    Early warning system using predictive analytics to identify students at-risk of missing graduation.

    Student Readiness Analytics

    Insights to track student preparedness for college and careers.

    Talent Analytics

    360-degree views of staff learning, staff needs, and data analysis to support recruitment and retention strategies.

    Continuous Improvement Plans

    Tools to help you create, track, and collaborate on school improvement plans.

    Connected Intelligence

    Data-as-a-Service to transform how schools collect, store, manage, and utilize data to improve educational outcomes while ensuring AI readiness.

    A single solution allowing educators to identify and track student needs, communicate with stakeholders, and monitor progress from one location.

    Artificial Intelligence

    AI-powered tools and assistant for everyone in educationLearn More >

    PowerBuddy for Assessment

    AI tools within Performance Matters to help educators quickly create and manage personalized, high-quality assessments for students.

    PowerBuddy for College & Career

    AI assistant within Naviance that provides personalized support to students, simplifying career exploration and postsecondary planning.

    PowerBuddy for Community

    AI assistant deployed on districts' public websites to answer questions instantly, improving stakeholder engagement.

    PowerBuddy for Data Analysis

    AI assistant to democratize data analysis by enabling educators to explore and visualize data using natural language.

    PowerBuddy for Engagement

    AI assistant for MyPowerHub providing instant, accurate answers to parents' common questions, saving time and strengthening school and home communications.

    PowerBuddy for Learning

    AI-driven assistance within Schoology Learning to support creating and delivery quality learning experiences and personalized student support.

Performance Matters

Assessment, reporting, and data analytics for better outcomes

Make assessment easier and more actionable with Performance Matters. Easily administer both classroom level and common district assessments to identify instructional opportunities with sophisticated analyses of assessment results and whole-child student metrics.

Get a Demo
Mosbacher Odyssey Academy

The most impactful platform we have implemented is Performance Matters…The reporting that comes from the embedded assessments is more powerful than anything we have seen previously…Through tools like the Baseball Card and Scoreboard, educational leaders are able to dynamically create digital data boards and share them with the knowledge that each person they share it with only sees the students they have permission to. This security feature means that we don’t have to create multiple versions of the same report, saving us all time and energy.”

Abby Blank Instructional Technology Specialist
Mosbacher Odyssey Academy

The foundation of your assessment strategy

0

Organizations Trust Performance Matters

0

Schools Supported

0

Teachers Benefited

Turn Assessment into Results

Empower District-Level Decisions

Review summarized performance data across your student population to gain insights on areas of strength and improvement.

Gain Insights into the Whole Child

Analyze academic data alongside attendance, behavior, and more. Gain a better understanding of each student and how to help them succeed.

Improve Student Achievement

With real-time assessment results, teachers can continuously monitor and adjust instruction to personalize each student’s learning journey.

Save Time

Speed up assessment creation and delivery with item banks, collaborative assessments, generative AI, real-time reporting, and auto-scoring.

Improve educational outcomes with powerful assessment and analysis tools

Make the Most of Your Data
  • Make the Most of Your Data
  • Easy Assessment Deployment
  • AI Built for Assessment
  • Powerful Integrations
  • Free Starter Item Bank

Make the Most of Your Data

National, state, local, and teacher-created assessments can be brought together with early warning information such as attendance, behavior, grades, and more.

Easy Assessment Deployment

Build and manage assessments for every need with pre-built, district and teacher created test items. Leverage technology enhanced items, interactive rubrics, and observational assessments to empower educators to authentically assess their students for better support.

AI Built for Assessment

With PowerBuddy for Assessment, you can easily generate assessment questions and write questions for any standard or subject. Easily create items tailored to your specific criteria, allowing you to save time and focus on helping your students succeed.

Powerful Integrations

Performance Matters is the center of your district’s assessment and data analysis needs. It has the power to work with data from PowerSchool and 3rd party solutions to give you a holistic view of your students’ data so that you can make the right decisions.

Free Starter Item Bank

The PowerSchool Starter Item Bank is a free collection of pre-made items that enables educators to create assessments and track student progress quickly.

Learn more about how Performance Matters can empower your educators

Get a Demo

Performance Matters PowerBuddy for Assessment

See how Performance Matters PowerBuddy for Assessment helps teachers create student assessments more quickly, easily and with a greater focus on personalization.

Learn More

How PowerSchool Protects Data

We are dedicated to protecting your students’ data with a comprehensive security program that starts with “secure by design” principles at the inception of our products and extends through third-party penetration testing, robust cloud security, and a fully staffed 24x7x365 Security Operations Center. Our products are independently validated by third-party auditors, ensuring your data is always protected with PowerSchool. To learn more visit our security page.

Beginner’s Guide to Personalized Learning

Learn how to shift from a one-size-fits-all instructional approach to authentic student-focused learning.
